## Tibbles


```{r}
#| Label: setup
library(tidyverse)
options(paged.print = FALSE)

```

```{r}
mtcars |> 
  class()
```

```{r}
mtcars_tib <- mtcars |> 
  as_tibble()
```

```{r}
mtcars |> 
  _[c("hp", "wt")] |> 
  head(n = 5)
```
```{r}
mtcars |> 
  _[["hp"]] |> 
  head(n = 5) |> 
  class()
```

```{r}
mtcars |> 
  _[["hp"]] |> 
  head(n = 5) |> 
  length()
```

```{r}
mtcars |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  _["hp"] |> 
  head(n = 5) |> 
  dim()
```
